reviewText: very informative video...learned a lot from it..

I can play the guitar...cords...and thought it would be nice to play a litle lead guitar...in watching the first 5 min of this cd..I was lost and could not follow what was going on..he went to fast and I just turned it off and said...I guess i wasted my money on this.
